verbose_text: In the absence of SHISA6, AMPAR subunits GluA2 and GluA3 are downregulated, while mice with a PC specific deletion of SHISA6 show strongly reduced PF to PC basal excitatory postsynaptic transmission, impaired LTP, and reduced SiSp activity in vivo.
evidence: AMPAR subunits GluA2 and GluA3 are downregulated, while mice with a PC-specific deletion of SHISA6 show strongly reduced PF to PC basal excitatory postsynaptic transmission, impaired LTP, and reduced SiSp
